ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 9
ComicInfo.Summary: Chapter 9: Jason leads the team to investigate suspicious activities by Powers International, but they encounter Sundowner who has turned against them. At Powers International, Bloom continues to work on his own agenda with Man-Bat. Meanwhile, Two-Face has an encounter with Black Mask.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 16:38:34. [CVDB932957] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:49:57. [Issue ID 2415110]
